channel.title: Herobrine plugin
channel.description:
Im just saying, we should really have a herobrine plugin :D
Just a suggestion lol, it would be awesome.

item.title: Herobrine plugin
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:25, topic:381377”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=477191.msg3496502#msg3496502 date=1297364526]

If you want we can both try and watch suicidemouse.avi together.

I dont get whats so scary about Suicide mouse, mind telling me?

TH CREEPY FUCKIN SCREAMS BRO

Nothing really, but when you’ve seen nearly every other good creepypasta, this one will probably get you. Did you read the story in the description as well?
Also, stay the fuck away from smile.dog. That shit creeps me out.
[/quote]

you mean this?[/quote]

prick that scared the crap out of me.

Read full topic

a clown? It’s a dog :|[/quote]

item.title: Herobrine plugin
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:382011”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=477191.msg3496502#msg3496502 date=1297364526]
Also, stay the fuck away from smile.dog. That shit creeps me out.
[/quote]

I got stood down because i had a knife in my hand. I got paranoid that Smile dog would jump at me on way to school, had to protect

@ytuio9 LOL :P[/quote]
The fucking screams.
and btw, when the picture starts getting distorted, I think someone’s being tortured… and at the 8th minute exactly, you see a guy staring at you. You can make his beard and nose out.

Read full topic

He came to meh in my dreams everyday and is telling me to host a private server in his name.

item.title: Herobrine plugin
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Logitek, post:12, topic:381377”]it would be kool considering in single play i hack

so if that littlebugger got to close and tried to pull a fast one with my max height solid obsidian castle

& walls 45 blocks thick, that cant be mines under because of the bedrock sitting on a lava pool

and full diamond armour with diamond sword and inventory of golden apples id mess him up. but in multiplayer id be like

“soab herobrine!, stop building 3x3 holes on my castle lawn!”[/quote]
Suck On A Block?

Read full topic

item.title: Herobrine plugin
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

ytuio9:

After reading creepypasta, I’m not really in the mood for fucking with herobrine. There’s a mod for SP called “More Humans” i think, it’s at the client mods section on the minecraftwiki, check that out.

I’m sorry I told you about them D:
If you want we can both try and watch suicidemouse.avi together.

Read full topic
